sentence: Comedian Trevor Noah made several jokes at DeSantiss expense during his performance at the White House Correspondents Dinner Saturday night, saying at one point that "Ron DeSantis is here," and looking into the audience as if he was directing his attention at the governor himself.
author: Nikolas Lanum
title: MSNBC, The View, late-night hosts repeatedly hurl personal attacks at DeSantis

author: David Rutz
title: Disney quiet on Sunny Hostin's disparaging remarks on Black, Latino Republicans: 'Silence is to be expected'

sentence: I asked her whether she'd vote for Ron DeSantis.
title: Alyssa Farah Griffin, the Ex-Trump Aide, Wants to Be America's Household Conservative
